title: Putin sorry for Lavrov's claim Hitler was part Jewish - Israel PM
description: Russia's foreign minister claimed that Nazi leader Adolf Hitler had Jewish blood, sparking outrage.

title: Ukraine war has dragged on, admits Putin ally Lukashenko
description: Belarus's authoritarian leader Lukashenko has defended the war but wants it to end.

title: Donbas fighting: Risking capture to evacuate the vulnerable from the front line
description: Civilian volunteers are going to the front line, but some have been detained by Russian forces.

title: Covid: World’s true pandemic death toll nearly 15 million, says WHO
description: These include deaths from Covid and from the indirect effects of the pandemic over two years worldwide.

title: China building collapse: Woman rescued from rubble after six days
description: The collapse of a building in the city of Changsha is now known to have killed at least 26 people.

title: Kenya alarm after carrier bag mistaken for stray lion
description: The Kenyan villagers were on alert after some of their livestock had recently gone missing.

title: Elon Musk lines up $7bn backing for Twitter deal
description: The billionaire has tapped the likes of Oracle's Larry Ellison and Sequoia to finance the takeover.

title: Iraq dust storm leaves 5,000 people needing treatment
description: It is the seventh severe dust storm in weeks, turning skies orange and causing breathing problems.

title: Senegal midwives go on trial in Louga over Astou Sokhna's death
description: Astou Sokhna died after reportedly being refused a Caesarean, sparking a national outcry.

title: Turkey's cost of living soars nearly 70%
description: Everyday goods including food and transport costs have seen among the biggest annual increases.

title: Why 9 May Victory Day is so important for Russia
description: Vladimir Putin has made it an annual event, but amid war in Ukraine 9 May has taken on new significance.

title: 'There's power in names': Antigua unearths lost ancestors
description: A landmark genealogy project is unearthing the names of enslaved people whose stories were erased.

title: Wealthy Russians flee to Dubai to avoid sanctions
description: Property purchases by Russians in Dubai surged by 67% in the first quarter of 2022, a report says.

title: Myanmar civil war: ‘I saw my son’s body on Facebook’
description: After the Myanmar military entered his village, Joseph fled into the jungle but his 13-year-old was killed.

title: Africa's digital business: The women swapping shops for smartphones
description: Three African women explain how they have boosted their income by going digital since Covid.

title: Bill Gates on Elon Musk feud and Jeffrey Epstein meetings
description: The Microsoft tycoon talks to the BBC about divorce, conspiracy theories and Elon Musk.

title: Why Sigrid feels on top of the world
description: The pop star talks lockdown blues, singing Nirvana at school, and why she moved all her gold discs.

title: How Covid-scarred Shanghai will finally exit lockdown
description: A mass clean-up is sweeping through Shanghai, with the city's gradual reopening expected to follow.

title: Russia rehearses World War Two victory parade
description: Military vehicles, weapons and soldiers were on display at a rehearsal for Russia's Victory Day parade.

title: Dust storm and wildfires seen from space
description: Satellite images show gusts of up to 60mph blowing dust across Colorado and plumes of smoke in New Mexico.

title: Disabled children 'dumped' in Ukrainian institutions
description: Thousands of disabled Ukrainian children reportedly left in institutions that can’t care for them.

title: Durban floods survivors: 'I thought the world was ending'
description: Moeketsi Manake and his family talk about losing everything, including their house, in the Durban floods.

title: Hungary will veto EU oil ban proposal - minister
description: Zoltán Kovács says the proposal is against the country's interests and would ruin the Hungarian economy.
